Hi,

Working on a new installer, not quite ready yet. Here is a link to a new VSIX with the templates you need.

Please uninstall the old VSIX first. For this, go to Visual Studio / Tools / Extensions and Updates / then select MVVM Light and click Uninstall.

Then double click this VSIX: http://sdrv.ms/UZngfo

You'll need to restart VS 12 to see the changes.

Cheers
